page.title: 15Our School 1
page.content: {Bethlehem Country Primary school}is a small country school with two teachers, a female teacher{Mrs. Thomas in the infant class and a male {headteacher Mr.Walters.}Other teachers also visit the school,{Mr.Eyre}teaches us recorders,{Mrs. Young}helps with welsh,{Mrs. Williams}sees to reading and{Mr. Lewis}teaches the violin.At present we have twenty fore children in school, thirteen in the junior class and elevan in the infant class. The name of the{caretaker}is{Mrs. {Thomas}and she lives near the school, she is the perant of one of the children.Although our meals are brought from{Llandeilo Central Kitchen in containers{Mrs. Davies}hands them out.There has been many changes in our school over the last few years. The school has aquired a small field given by a local farmer.
